name: Project Senseless (Project Violence -Shin-)
description:
A new prototype for a very old pet project. Currently has three characters and two and a half stages.

Currently Windows only, but will make Mac and Linux builds on demand.

  • Defense - Guard
  • Defense+Down - Crouch
  • Defense+Forward - Run
  • Defense+Back - Backstep
  • Defense+Up - Jump
  • Defense+Attack - Grab
    • Attack - Clinch attack
    • Defense+Attack - Throw
    • [While held] Attack - Tech
